com.luna.common.mutable

Class MutableInt

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • com.luna.common.mutable.MutableInt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mutable<Number>, Serializable, Comparable<MutableInt>

    public class MutableInt
extends Number
implements Comparable<MutableInt>, Mutable<Number>
    可变 int 类型
    Since:
    3.0.1
    See Also:
    Integer, Serialized Form
